sources.title: The Thundering Herd (1933) Buster Crabbe & Randolph Scott | Western Movie (Colorized)
sources.description:
Buffalo stampedes... Indian attacks... Plundering bandits... He braved them all when he rode into the badlands... and rode out with a beautiful girl! 
Both Sprague, Jett and their crews are hunting buffalo. Doan is with Sprague and is looking for the Jett outfit where his girlfriend Milly is being held against her will. In addition to the thieving Jett who is stealing Sprague's furs, the Indians are gathering to attack all the white buffalo hunters.

Original title: Buffalo Stampede (1933) AKA: The Thundering Herd 
This film is available with English & Spanish audio.  And subtitles in many language options.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/gqE5xOzWJcA


Director: Henry Hathaway
Writers: Zane Grey, Jack Cunningham 
Stars: Randolph Scott, Judith Allen, Buster Crabbe
Genre: Colorized classic, Western


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
02:02 Adventure in the Wild West involving cattle rustling, hidden identities, and unexpected alliances.
05:59 Discussion on resolving a problem, misunderstandings, and tensions among characters.
13:21 Intrigue and deception unfold as characters navigate through a series of events in a Western setting.
16:19 Discussion about marriage arrangements and hunting plans leads to a decision to leave a bride behind.
25:30 Drama unfolds as a man is shot during a confrontation, leading to a rescue mission and reflections on life choices.
30:00 Cowboys track a large herd of cattle, encounter challenges, and discuss their plans in a Western movie.
31:28 Cowboys prepare for a buffalo hunt and discuss business plans in the wild west.
40:21 Wild West adventure unfolds as characters navigate through snowstorm and treacherous terrain.
46:46 Wild west adventure unfolds as characters navigate through a dangerous situation.


@CultCinemaClassics
